Translations.Text: Eben karavan alven their patr dir mi sens odor Joseph. someone enlighten me
Ili dir DI vi est ankoraux your old confusion
When bearer bon news alven li jxet (cxemiz) his vizagx whereupon his vizi restored Li dir mi ne tell vi mi kon DI ki vi ne kon
Ili dir Our patr pregx our forgiveness; ni est wrong ja
Li dir mi implore my Lord forgive vi; Li est Forgiver Merciful
When ili entered Joseph's kvartal li embraced his parents dir Welcome al Egypt! DI testament VI est SEKUR here

Li raised his parents tron. Ili fal prostrate antaux him. Li dir O my patr this est fulfillment my old songx. My Lord far gxi ven prav. Li ben me liver me prison brought vi el dezert post diabl driv kojn me my frat! My Lord est Kind towards whomever Li vol. Li est Knower plej Sagx
My Lord Vi don me kingship instru me interpretation de songx! Initiator de heavens ter; Vi est my Lord Mastr en this life Hereafter Let me mort as submitter count me kun des righteous
(This est news preter ni reveal vi. Vi est prezent when ili far their unanimous decision jxet Joseph put) as ili konspir together
Plej popol ne materi ki vi ne kred
Vi ne pet them any mon; vi simply liver this reminder all popol
